titles: His Majesties letter to the major, aldermen, sheriffes, and the rest of the Common-Councell of the citty of Bristoll
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)

notes: "Given at our court at Oxford the 29. day of May. 1643."
